subject: FIX READY: organizerId filter added to GET /api/events
body:
## Fix Implemented

Added `organizerId` query param to `GET /api/events` with the same $or filter logic as `/api/events/count`:

```javascript
$or: [
  { ownerOrganizerID: organizerObjId },
  { grantedOrganizerID: organizerObjId },
  { alternateOrganizerID: organizerObjId }
]
```

## Usage

```
GET /api/events?appId=1&organizerId=680669172f9268813021246c
```

This will return all events where the organizer is owner, granted, OR alternate.

## Status

- Code complete in DEVL branch
- Pending commit & deploy to Azure
- Will notify when live in test environment

## Schema Note

Still using OLD structure (3 separate fields). Future TIEMPO-346 will add NEW `alternateOrganizers[]` array format.
